Posts.Content: hiya mia have just joined this site and read your post ,whilst reading it i felt the same words coming out of my mind lol.I was diagnosed with Bc 2 weeks ago,i feel like im in a bubble thats gonna burst I have been told i am a stage 3 ,rapid growth cancer ,which really freaked me out when i heard .I am trying to be positive but also afraid to what to expect this week .Im starting chemo first then hopefully the lump will shrink and leave smaller lump for the op.After reading all your posts ,your all getting ops first ... i promise not to start worrying from those and trust my cancer nurse ,she is lovely Im hoping loads of you we keep me sane and in a positive manner .im even booked in to do the race for life in june Anyone want to add me as a friend please do as im gonna have loads of time on my hands now wish me luck for this week ellie x Â
Posts.Title: D day

Posts.Content: hiys janie ,thanks for the advice,shall put the pineapple on my shopping list no one has mentioned about therapists massaging feet .Im glad yours is going ok ,and you managed to work ,ive just got signed off as dont know what to expect .I will keep you all updated ellie xxx
